# CryptoPrices
PHP script to get BTC, ETH and DOGE prices every hour

### crypto.php
Usage:
$ ./crypto.php &

Will run on background and log the prices every hour.

### crypto2fiat.php
Usage:
$ ./crypto2fiat.php

01/07/2021 07:31:34 | 165952.00 | 10628.88 | 1.23 | R$18,200.52
